title: Uncertain Destiny
description: Read this classic romance by USA Today bestselling author Carole Mortimer, now available for the first time in e-book!Pregnant with her convenient husband's child...Caroline Maxwell knew when she married Justin de Wolfe that their marriage was one of convenience. But drawn to Justin by a fierce mutual passion, the usually sensible Caroline married him knowing that he couldn't love her--just as she couldn't help loving him.She accepts the hazards of a marriage to the arrogant, magnetic lawyer--his aversion to love, sudden changes in mood and his restless nightmares. But how will Justin react when Caroline announces she's pregnant with his baby...?Originally published in 1987
author: Carole Mortimer
